original_title: Antifa:  Rise of the Black Flags
overview: The true history of the anti-government extremist terrorist group's century of violence. Focusing on the group which has caused nationwide rioting and violence, The film – which undermines the mainstream media’s depiction of the group as “just an idea” – has already been censored by YouTube and Vimeo.
title: Antifa:  Rise of the Black Flags
